name: Den of Evil
description:
You are trapped in a castle populated with vile minions of evil and deadly traps. Use your good old gun and a bunch of ammo to blow everything to hell. Explore the nooks and crannies of the castle and its eerie dungeons, looking for keys and secrets, don't forget to kill great mystical evil lurking in the old tower.

MOUSE to aim and LEFT BUTTON to shoot.

WSAD or ARROWS to control character.

ENTER, SPACE or C button to open doors, chests, etc.

1,2,3 key to change weapon.

ESCAPE to pause game, exit to main menu.

Hit blue save icon at left-top to save your current game progress.

Hit gray map icon at left-top to show game map.
